author: Nando Imamura
description: A bittersweet apéritif combining gentian herbal complexity with attractive coffee, cachaça and calvados spirituous notes.
name: Fernand x Nando
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc) (infused with coffee beans)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over block ice)
